CustomField.description: Indicates if the Billing Cycle Anchor should be reset when a threshold is reached. If checked, Billing Cycle Anchor will be updated to the date/time the threshold was last reached; otherwise, the value will remain unchanged.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates if the Billing Cycle Anchor should be reset when a threshold is reached. If checked, Billing Cycle Anchor will be updated to the date/time the threshold was last reached; otherwise, the value will remain unchanged.
CustomField.label: Reset Billing Cycle Anchor
